languages.text: "Если бы "шерин Джай" нагрешила в достаточной мере, чтобы у меня было на нее досье, госпожа Хейдари давно бы никому не докучала".
"If the smuggler had committed enough transgressions for me to have a file on her, our 'shereen' Mistress Heydari would have ceased to be a nuisance a long time ago."
languages.original_text: "Если бы "шерин Джай" нагрешила в достаточной мере, чтобы у меня было на нее досье, госпожа Хейдари давно бы никому не докучала".

traits.locale_text: "If the smuggler had committed enough transgressions for me to have a file on her, our 'shereen' Mistress Heydari would have ceased to be a nuisance a long time ago."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If the smuggler had committed enough transgressions for me to have a file on her, our 'shereen' Mistress Heydari would have ceased to be a nuisance a long time ago."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If the smuggler had committed enough transgressions for me to have a file on her, our 'shereen' Mistress Heydari would have ceased to be a nuisance a long time ago."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If the smuggler had committed enough transgressions for me to have a file on her, our 'shereen' Mistress Heydari would have ceased to be a nuisance a long time ago."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如果那个走私者犯下了重罪，她的档案落在我手里的话，那恐怕我们‘亲爱的’海达利女士很久以前就再也惹不了麻烦了。”
languages.original_text: "If the smuggler had committed enough transgressions for me to have a file on her, our 'shereen' Mistress Heydari would have ceased to be a nuisance a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: “如果那个走私者犯下了重罪，她的档案落在我手里的话，那恐怕我们‘亲爱的’海达利女士很久以前就再也惹不了麻烦了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Si cette contrebandière avait commis suffisamment de transgressions pour que j'aie un dossier sur elle, voilà bien longtemps que notre "shereen" maîtresse Heydari aurait cessé d'être une nuisance. »
languages.original_text: "If the smuggler had committed enough transgressions for me to have a file on her, our 'shereen' Mistress Heydari would have ceased to be a nuisance a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: « Si cette contrebandière avait commis suffisamment de transgressions pour que j'aie un dossier sur elle, voilà bien longtemps que notre "shereen" maîtresse Heydari aurait cessé d'être une nuisance. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Si la contrabandista acumulara suficientes transgresiones como para constar en mis archivos, le aseguro que nuestra "shereen", la señora Heydari, habría dejado de ser un problema hace mucho».
languages.original_text: "If the smuggler had committed enough transgressions for me to have a file on her, our 'shereen' Mistress Heydari would have ceased to be a nuisance a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: «Si la contrabandista acumulara suficientes transgresiones como para constar en mis archivos, le aseguro que nuestra "shereen", la señora Heydari, habría dejado de ser un problema hace mucho».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「密輸業者の記録が俺の手元に渡るほどの罪を犯していたなら、われらが”シェリーン”、ミストレス・ヘイダリはずいぶん前に駆除されていたはずだ」
languages.original_text: "If the smuggler had committed enough transgressions for me to have a file on her, our 'shereen' Mistress Heydari would have ceased to be a nuisance a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: 「密輸業者の記録が俺の手元に渡るほどの罪を犯していたなら、われらが”ダーリン”、ミストレス・ヘイダリはずいぶん前に駆除されていたはずだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hätte die Schmugglerin genügend Verstöße begangen, dass ich eine Akte über sie habe, so wäre unsere 'Shereen' Herrin Heydari schon seit langem kein Ärgernis mehr."
languages.original_text: "If the smuggler had committed enough transgressions for me to have a file on her, our 'shereen' Mistress Heydari would have ceased to be a nuisance a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: "Hätte die Schmugglerin genügend Verstöße begangen, dass ich eine Akte über sie habe, so wäre unsere 'Shereen' Herrin Heydari schon seit langem kein Ärgernis mehr."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "If the smuggler had committed enough transgressions for me to have a file on her, our 'shereen' Mistress Heydari would have ceased to be a nuisance a long time ago."

languages.text: "Kaçakçı, kendisi hakkında dosya tutmayı gerektirecek kadar suç işlemiş olsaydı 'şirinimiz' Üstat Heydari, uzun zaman önce sorun olmaktan çıkardı."
languages.original_text: "If the smuggler had committed enough transgressions for me to have a file on her, our 'shereen' Mistress Heydari would have ceased to be a nuisance a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: "Kaçakçı, kendisi hakkında dosya tutmayı gerektirecek kadar suç işlemiş olsaydı 'şirinimiz' Üstat Heydari, uzun zaman önce sorun olmaktan çıkardı."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
